emaillist.herotext: Find new leads with software that actively searchs for and discovers clients who will benefit from your offerings.
emaillist.quote: “I want to do business with a company that treats emailing me as a privilege, not a transaction.” – Andrea Mignolo
emaillist.para: Lead generation software automates the process of identifying and sourcing high-quality prospects, utilizing advanced algorithms and data analytics to discover potential clients who are most likely to engage with your business.

facts.heading: Client Project: 1000s of emails across directories were obtained for a client.
facts.fact: Web scrapers and crawling software was used to scan through pages of directories. When a company, service or individual matched the description given by the client, the email was added to a contacts list. Each email was then tested for validity before being sent to the client

facts.heading: Client Project: New contacts on LinkedIn were identified using a page scraper that searched databases to identify matches against a set criteria.
facts.fact: A custom tool was built for a client so that they could enter search parameters that would search LinkedIn using custom search queries. The details of the contacts on each of these pages was then scraped and a link to their profile saved so that the client could later send the contact a connection request

facts.heading: Client Project: A marketing and email campaign was used to identify all group members of a Facebook group for use in a marketing research study.
facts.fact: Contacts obtained through the search were identified as being potential prospects for marketing research. The client was able to request that clients participate in a market research study

databasedesign.herotext: Empowering your data, and elevating your business.
databasedesign.text: Effective databases ensures that data is stored logically and efficiently, making it easier to retrieve, update and manage information.
databasedesign.quote: “Simplicity is the soul to efficiency.” – Austin Freeman

facts.heading: PCN Notification - Integrating databases into web driven applications.
facts.fact: Working closely with a client, a database was designed to store and manage customer contact information, car vehicle details, payments, parking charge notices and user's account details. As a result, a seamless user experience was able to be created through managing customer information and payment status made to external APIs

SEOAffiliates.herotext: Reach new audiences and monetise site traffic
SEOAffiliates.quote: SEO is an investment just like a tree that needs effort, patience and time to grow before you can see the result.
SEOAffiliates.text: Utilise the power of SEO keywords and affiliate partnership programs on your web page
SEOAffiliates.para: Undertake keyword research campaigns and create content that increases your page ranking. Add affiliate content to the web page and monetise page visits.

facts.heading: SEO keyword research specific to your industry
facts.fact: Increase web page search engine ranking using better matched keywords and content!

facts.heading: Monetise page visits and generate income
facts.fact: Embed links to affiliate marketing and monetise page clicks!

facts.heading: Start small and build up
facts.fact: Increase traffic using link building, blogs and social media!

WebDevelopment.herotext: Full Stack Web Applications utilise multiple technologies and frameworks that allows users to interact with a web interface while it processes data on back end operations
WebDevelopment.quote:
“Website without visitors is like a ship lost in the horizon.”
― Dr. Christopher Dayagdag
WebDevelopment.para: A well-crafted full stack web application enhances user experience by ensuring seamless interaction, quick response times, and a cohesive interface that feels both intuitive and responsive. Many full stack web applications exist including: Netflix, Airbnb and Twitter.

facts.heading: Client Project: A parking payment notification system.
facts.fact: This project allowed the client to build a SAAS (Software as a service) web application where users would have to pay to receive a reminder about having to pay a parking charge notice. It was built using PostgreSQL, Flask and React. The application integrates a login authentication system and payment authorisation to limit access to the search features to only users who have subscribed to the service.

WebScraping.herotext: Scrape content from across the web
WebScraping.text: Web scraping is the automated process of extracting data from websites. This technique involves using software tools or scripts to navigate web pages, identify specific content, and retrieve information, which can then be stored and analyzed for various purposes such as market research, data analysis, and competitive intelligence.
WebScraping.quote: “ Scraping drives the decline of banal and repetitive tasks.” — Amber Rudd.

facts.heading: Client Project: Betting Price Scraper
facts.fact: A web scraper that scraped every odd from Paddy Power onto a CSV spreadsheet that was used in MachineLearning prediction software.

facts.heading: Client Project: Property Scanner
facts.fact: A set of multi-processing web scrapers were used to scrape data from leading property prices to provide users with more search results.

facts.heading: Client Project: Recruitment
facts.fact: A web scraper used to extract a 2000 long list of open vacancies with European companies.

WebToolDevelopment.herotext: Software that can run as a plugin to a web browser, as a desktop app or as modification to existing software
WebToolDevelopment.text: Add new plugins to your Chrome Browser, build applications for the Chrome marketplace or utilise custom technologies that embed code onto web pages while you browse

facts.heading: Client Project: LinkedIn Search Tool
facts.fact: A client wanted to automate searching LinkedIn for new leads. I created a plugin for a browser that would automate the search and print out a list of matching connections containing links they could use to connect. This helped them to significantly reduce the time it took them to find candidates for roles

facts.heading: Client Project: Stock Price Watcher
facts.fact: A client asked me to build a desktop application that would monitor stock prices. The application worked in real time and played a sound whenever the price went below the target that they could set on the application. As a result, they were able to save expensive costs for subscribing and purchasing pre-exisitng software
